short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds keyboard shortcuts (hotkeys) to play/pause, play next, play previous, and like tracks in SoundCloud

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Default keyboard shortcuts are:

Play/Pause: Alt+Shift+P
Next: Alt+Shift+Period
Previous: Alt+Shift+Comma
Like: Alt+Shift+L

**On Mac, replace Alt with Option**
